thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan gets chased by a big cat
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan gets chased by a big cat - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Amitabh Bachchan gets chased by a big cat
text:
Amitabh Bachchan was on a jungle safari in the Sanjay Gandhi National Park in Mumbai on Tuesday, and their bus ended up being chased by a tiger.
READ: Amitabh Bachchan: Saving tigers is everybody's responsibility
Listen to songs of Amitabh Bachchan on Gaana.com
"Chased by a tiger in the heart of Mumbai for 4 kms ," he tweeted along with pictures.
 updates
WATCH: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Amitabh Bachchan will forever be iconic - TOI
